entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Thursday 13 April 2023
